doc.value: List Navigation profile for RWMBook. Whenever presenting lists of records, services SHOULD emit a set of navigation links that help the client move forward and back in the list, select an item from the list and exit the list navigation.
The URL of the most recently used action
The link relation value of the most recently used action. This value SHOULD also include the link relation value of 'mru'
Human readable title associated with the link
Represents one or more link elements for navigating a list of records.
Home represents any current document or starting point in the flow
Represents any single record in the list.
Represents an 'exit' state when leaving the list.
A safe, idempotent action to return to the Home document
An optional safe idempotent action to view the list of records.
An optional safe idempotent action to navigate to the top of the list.
An optional safe idempotent action to view the previous page in the list of records.
An optional safe idempotent action to view the next page in the list of records.
An optional safe idempotent action to view the last page in the list of records.
An optional safe idempotent action to select an item in the list of records.
An optional safe idempotent action to exit the list navigation.
